content.raw:
Hi,
I have a robot with two wheels that rotate around z axis sometimes. The wheels are exactly the same, and parameters are set the same. Heat map for the rotation is attached from above angle. I'm not sure how this happens. Could someone help? Thanks a lot! 
	  <gazebo reference="wheel_left_link">
	    <mu1>1.0</mu1>
	    <mu2>1.0</mu2>
	    <kp>10000000.0</kp>
	    <kd>100.0</kd>
	    <minDepth>0.001</minDepth>
	    <maxVel>1.0</maxVel>
	  </gazebo>

	  <gazebo reference="wheel_right_link">
	    <mu1>1.0</mu1>
	    <mu2>1.0</mu2>
	    <kp>10000000.0</kp>
	    <kd>100.0</kd>
	    <minDepth>0.001</minDepth>
	    <maxVel>1.0</maxVel>
	  </gazebo>
content.html:
Hi, I have a robot with two wheels that rotate around z axis sometimes. The wheels are exactly the same, and parameters are set the same. Heat map for the rotation is attached from above angle. I'm not sure how this happens. Could someone help? Thanks a lot! <gazebo reference="wheel_left_link"> <mu1>1.0</mu1> <mu2>1.0</mu2> <kp>10000000.0</kp> <kd>100.0</kd> <minDepth>0.001</minDepth> <maxVel>1.0</maxVel> </gazebo>

  <gazebo reference="wheel_right_link">
    <mu1>1.0</mu1>
    <mu2>1.0</mu2>
    <kp>10000000.0</kp>
    <kd>100.0</kd>
    <minDepth>0.001</minDepth>
    <maxVel>1.0</maxVel>
  </gazebo>
